# National Board of Review Awards 1972

44th National Board of Review Awards
December 14, 1972
{| border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" align="center"
|-
| style="border: 1px" |
|}
The 44th National Board of Review Awards were announced on December 14, 1972.
Top Ten Films
#Cabaret
#Man of La Mancha
#The Godfather
#Sounder
#1776
#The Effect of Gamma Rays on Man-in-the-Moon Marigolds
#Deliverance
#The Ruling Class
#The Candidate
#Frenzy
Top Foreign Films
#The Sorrow and the Pity
#The Emigrants
#The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie
#Chloe in the Afternoon
#Uncle Vanya
Winners
*Best Film:
**Cabaret
*Best Foreign Film:
**The Sorrow and the Pity
*Best Actor:
**Peter O'Toole - Man of La Mancha, The Ruling Class
*Best Actress:
**Cicely Tyson - Sounder
*Best Supporting Actor:
**Al Pacino - The Godfather
**Joel Grey - Cabaret
*Best Supporting Actress:
**Marisa Berenson - Cabaret
*Best Director:
**Bob Fosse - Cabaret
